member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the list of supported formats.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS.NodeIndex
member.summary: For single GPU operation, set this to zero. If there are multiple GPU nodes, set a bit to identify the node (the device's physical adapter) to which the command queue applies. Each bit in the mask corresponds to a single node. Only 1 bit may be set.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS.Configuration
member.summary: A structure describing the decode configuration for the list of formats.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS.FormatCount
member.summary: The number of formats to retrieve. This number must match the value returned from a call when the feature specified is .

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_DECODE_FORMATS.pOutputFormats
member.summary: A list of structures representing the supported formats.
